T

Table - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Table
Class storing all common resources between players in the same game: Stores the card pools, the shared objectives etc.
Can be interpreted as the "table" on top of which the game is being played.
Table(List<Card>, List<Card>, List<Card>, List<Objective>, ObserverRelay) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Table.Table
Default constructor.
